description:
- Earn your first money by pressing a "Y" button.
- Increase your income by buying new elements of Cyber Engine like coolers, CPUs, transistors. 
- Use a Thermal Paste to upgrade all your engine parts.
- Overclocking decreases your engine phase and your supercomputer will earn more money every second.
- Learn new technologies to open Database, Computer Games and Internet.
- Beware of breakdowns! Breakdowns will decrease your income money every second.
Build a full Cyber Engine and earn a billion dollars!
name: Cyber Engine
intro: “Cyber Engine” is an incremental game where you need to build a supercomputer in a futuristic style of technology.
